author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: You'll want some `[compat]` bounds, at least for Julia itself. You may also want to consider a more descriptive name, see the [package naming guidelines](https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/v1/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines-1).
compat is added, but it's hard for me to come up with a new name.
Several candidates are NLUKit, NLPToolKit, and TextSystems. I am not confident in anyone since the ultimate purpose of this package is to help people build and deploy NLP system in a convenient way.
Up to you. If you want to go with `Ant` that's ok too. Just retrigger when you're ready.
Ok, I prefer `Ant` for this package. `compat` updates have been triggered.

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/del2z/Ant.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- f5b4b630-86e3-11e9-9f54-52513bc21a05 -->
